name: Farm defence 101
description: This game was made for the lowres 2022 game jam, controls: WASD to move, F to interact, LEFT CLICK to use, RIGHT CLICK to melee. Gameplay: try to farm while avoiding or killing angry crows, step on crops while not holding an object to pop them out of the ground, pick up crops by running over them with a crate, throw crates into the conveyor belt or kill crows to gain money (carrots double money).
